column3: Na ntseasee ma ne ndze do bi?"
Nkwanta do na ogyinae;"
wɔ kurotsia
hom na mefrɛ hom oo; Na me ndze refrɛ adasamba nyina."
hom nhu enyitsew; Na
na merebɛka nsɛm a oye kyɛn; Na m’ano bobue aka nsɛm a ɔfata."

column2: "Na nokwar befi m’anomu; Na emumuyɛ yɛ m’ano ekyiwadze."
"M’anomu nsɛm nyinara nam tsenenee mu; Adze nkyeakyeae anaa kɔtɔnkye biara nnyi mu."
"Ne nyinara mu da edzi ma ntseaseenyi
column3: Na ɔtsen ma hɔn a wohu nyimdzee."
na nnyɛ dwetɛ; Na hom ngye nyimdzee nkyɛn sika a wɔahwɛ mu."

column2: "Nyansa ye sen mbota; Na akɔndɔdze nyinara wɔmmfa nnto ho."

column3: nyansa
column4: na medze enyitsew ayɛ me tsenabew

column2: "EWURADZE ho suro nye bɔn ne kyir: Na ntsɛn
column3: enyimenam
na nyimdzee pa so: Ntseasee nye mara; mowɔ tum."

column2: "Emi na ahemfo wɔdze me dzi hen
column3: Na etsitsir dze me bua atsɛn."

column2: "Emi na mpanyimfo dze me dzi mpanyin
column3: Na ekunyin so
modɔ hɔn a wɔdɔ me; Na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me anapahema no wobohu me."

column2: "Ahonya na enyidzi wɔ mo hɔ; Nyew
column3: ahonya a otsim na ndzeyɛtsenenee wɔ mu."
nyew
column4: ɔsen sika mapa; No mu ndɔbaa sen dwetɛ a wɔasan mu eyiyi."

column3: Atsɛmbu akwan mu so:"

column2: "Ama hɔn a wɔdɔ me no woeenya adze edzi
column3: Na maahyehyɛ hɔn akoradze amaama."

column2: "EWURADZE bɔɔ me dze hyɛɛ no kwan ase
column3: Ne tsetse ndwuma mu ɔkandzifo."
fir ahyɛse
nna wɔwoo me; Aber a nsunyiwa a ɔba nsu pii nnyi hɔ no."
Ansaana akoko reba

column2: "Aber a onnyae nnyɛɛ asaase na nhaban
column3: Na ommbuu wiadze huntuma ano no
column6: nna mowɔ hɔ: Aber a orutwa ebun no enyi kɔntɔnkrɔn no:"

column2: "Aber a ɔyɛɛ wimu ɔsor pintsinn no; Aber a ebun no no nsunyiwa yɛɛ dzendzen no:"
"Aber a otwaa epo ne he maa no
column3: Ma esu emmbu ne mbrasɛm do; Aber a ɔsensaan asaase ne fapem no:"
dɛ odwimfopanyin: Na meyɛɛ n’enyigyedze daa nyinara

column2: "Midzii ehurusi wɔ n’asaase a wɔtsena do yi mu; Na n’enyigyedze wɔ adasamba mu."

column3: me mba
column5: Na esiarfo nye hɔn a wosie m’akwan."

column3: na hom nhu nyansa
Ɔweɔn m’aponkɛse ano daa daa. Ɔweɔn wɔ mo mbobow apondua ho."
ohu nkwa

column2: "Na obiara a ɔyɛ bɔn tsia me no
column3: ɔyɛ nankasa ne kra bɔn. Hɔn a wokyir me nyinara wɔdɔ owu."
